title: Problem-solving prior learning (PS-I)-based science concept enrichment course: Utilizing goal-setting strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Enhanced interaction through real-time collaboration tools (digital whiteboards, live polls).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately connect core concepts of science problems to stated learning objectives with 80% or greater accuracy
Learners can generate three or more relevant solution attempts by applying prior knowledge activation strategies during problem-solving
Learners can improve conceptual understanding by 20% through comparative analysis of approach differences based on goal types (learning/problem-solving)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
